example.parse: (NP-TPC-1 (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الدَولَة)) (NP-TMP (NOUN بَعْد) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG الأَزْمَة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG الٱِقْتِصادِيَّة) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG العالَمِيَّة))) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3FS فَقَدِت) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN جُزء) (ADJ كِبِير)) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (NP (NP (NOUN دَخْل) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (ADJP (DET+ADJ القَوْمِيّ))) (PP (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL عائِدات) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG قَناَة) (NP (DET+NOUN_PROP السُوِيس))))) (CONJ وَ) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG السِياحَة))) (CONJ وَ) (PP (PREP مِن) (NP (DET+NOUN الٱِسْتِثْمار))))))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG عِلاوَة) (PP (PREP عَلَى) (S-NOM (VP (NOUN.VN إِحْجام) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN الناس)) (PP-CLR (PREP عَن) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG حَرَكَة) (NP (DET+NOUN البِيع) (CONJ وَ) (DET+NOUN الشِراء)))))))))))
